databaseConfig.sql:
select MS_SENIN_COMPANY_ID , COMPANY_NAME , DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS
from MS_SENIN_COMPANY
where (DELETE_FLAG = 0 or DELETE_FLAG is NULL)

INSERT INTO MS_SENIN_COMPANY( MS_SENIN_COMPANY_ID , COMPANY_NAME , DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :MS_SENIN_COMPANY_ID , :COMPANY_NAME , :DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_SENIN_COMPANY SET COMPANY_NAME = :COMPANY_NAME, DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG, SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO = :DATA_NO, USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID, TS = :TS where MS_SENIN_COMPANY_ID = :MS_SENIN_COMPANY_ID and TS = :TS
